 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵ֫פֶל‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==bowl== (√ unknown; perhaps foreign word; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***saplu***</u></abbr>, ***bowl***, ***basin*** (DI<sup>HWB 508</sup> [[BDB#Schr|Schr]]<sup>COT [[2Kgs.9.2|2Kgs 9:2]]</sup>) [occurs as object of tribute or plunder]; Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִיפְלָא‎</span> ***bowl, basin***, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (wash-)***basin*** [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 64</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bowl, jar*** [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>Levy NHWB iii,320; Kl. Schr.ii. 556 f.</sup> is perhaps loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>67 f.</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֹא הַסּ‎</span> [[Judg.6.38|Judg 6:38]] for drinking, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֵפֶל אַדִּירִים‎</span> [[Judg.5.25|Judg 5:25]] ***a bowl of*** (fit for) ***nobles, huge bowl*** ([[BDB#GFM|GFM]]).
